Giant's Soldier:
After the death of his soul took Ramune Sihem, and body bequest went to the Giants. They say that the Giants absorbed body Ramune and got the ability to fly.
The remaining part of the land they have betrayed. And speed up the movement of these flightless guns spicules.
Today we call these Ramune Moves clods. Ramune can use after Awaking, you will receive power when the Giants.
